decks.notes: The main concept of this deck revolves around utilizing aggressive creatures and disruptive spells to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. By combining efficient creatures like Sanctifier en-Vec and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd with removal spells like Solitude and Prismatic Ending, the deck aims to apply pressure while keeping the opponent in check. Additionally, cards like Rest in Peace and Sanctifier en-Vec help to disrupt graveyard strategies, making it difficult for opponents to rely on recursion or graveyard interactions. The deck's mana base is also designed to support its aggressive game plan with efficient land fetching and mana fixing.

The main concept of this deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while applying pressure with aggressive creatures. The deck aims to control the game through removal spells like Fatal Push and Force of Negation, while also utilizing creatures like Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd and Overlord of the Balemurk to deal damage quickly. Cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Subtlety provide additional disruption, allowing the deck to maintain control of the board. The deck's strategy revolves around efficiently managing resources and outpacing the opponent to secure a victory.

This deck focuses on aggressive strategies with a mix of different colors to maximize efficiency. The key concept is to overwhelm the opponent early in the game with aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Territorial Kavu while using efficient removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Stubborn Denial to control the board. Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding provide additional support by boosting the power of creatures and hindering the opponent's spells. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury to quickly close out games.

This deck focuses on playing aggressively with a mixture of efficient creatures and disruptive spells to put pressure on the opponent. It aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while also delivering quick damage through creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phage, Titan of Fire's Fury. The deck also utilizes bounce effects like Ephemerate and Teferi, Time Raveler to control the board and protect its own creatures. The mana base is built to ensure consistency and access to multiple colors for the spells in the deck.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay with a mix of red, green, and white cards. It utilizes powerful creatures like Ragavan, Scion of Draco, and Territorial Kavu to deal damage quickly to the opponent. The deck also includes control elements like Leyline of the Guildpact and Stubborn Denial to protect its creatures and disrupt the opponent's strategy. Consign to Memory and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker provide additional versatility and card advantage. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of fast creatures and disruptive spells.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly assemble the Allosaurus Combo, which involves using Eldritch Evolution or Neoform to sacrifice Allosaurus Rider and fetch Griselbrand from the deck. This allows for a powerful combo that can quickly win the game. The deck also includes ways to protect the combo with Pact of Negation and Veil of Summer, as well as ramping mana with cards like Planar Genesis and Nourishing Shoal. A mix of card draw, ramp, and protection spells makes this a powerful and consistent combo deck in Modern.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly establish a board presence with aggressive creatures like White Orchid Phantom and Ocelot Pride while disrupting your opponent's strategy with cards like Solitude and Quantum Riddler. By utilizing cards such as Ephemerate and March of Otherworldly Light, you can protect your key creatures and generate value. Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd and Starfield Shepherd provide additional support for your enchantment-based strategy, while cards like Consign to Memory and No More Lies offer versatile removal options. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure and disrupt opponents to secure victory.

The deck focuses on assembling a variety of creatures to both generate value and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The key idea is to use cards like Chord of Calling and Birthing Ritual to search for specific creatures and create a toolbox of options. The creatures, such as Cauldron Familiar, Orcish Bowmasters, and Carrion Feeder, provide utility and advantages in different situations, while also fueling combos with cards like Viscera Seer and Yawgmoth, Thran Physician. Boseiju, Who Endures can protect key spells from counterspells, adding another layer of control to the deck.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly build a strong board presence by utilizing artifacts and aggressive creatures like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Cori-Steel Cutter. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with creatures and spells like Metallic Rebuke and Lightning Bolt to control the board while dealing damage. Urza's Saga helps to search for key artifacts while Mox Opal and Mox Amber provide ramp and mana acceleration. The inclusion of disruption cards like Unholy Heat and Soul-Guide Lantern adds versatility and control to the deck's game plan.

This deck focuses on quickly bringing powerful creatures onto the battlefield by using instant reanimation spells like Goryo's Vengeance and Ephemerate. By utilizing cards like Psychic Frog and Quantum Riddler to control the game, the deck aims to set up game-winning combos with creatures like Griselbrand and Ulamog, the Defiler. It also includes disruptive elements like Force of Negation and Thoughtseize to disrupt opponents' strategies. The deck combines quick reanimation with control elements to overwhelm opponents and secure victory.

This deck focuses on using artifacts to quickly overwhelm the opponent and deal damage efficiently. It utilizes cards that can generate mana and draw cards to keep up the pressure while also disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Pithing Needle. The deck aims to win the game by deploying a large number of threats early on and maintaining board presence through efficient card draw and artifact recursion. By combining aggro tactics with the synergy of affinity cards, this deck seeks to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent in a fast-paced Modern format 1 vs 1 game.

The main concept of this deck is to create a powerful combo utilizing Broodscale Bloodchief and various support cards to overwhelm your opponent. By using cards like Malevolent Rumble, Blade of the Bloodchief, and Devourer of Destiny, you can quickly build up your creatures and control the battlefield. Utilizing Eldrazi Temple and Urza's Saga, you can ramp up your resources to play powerful creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and Basking Broodscale. This deck aims to establish board presence and dominate the game through strategic plays and synergies.

This control deck utilizes Eldrazi ramp to quickly cast powerful threats such as Emrakul, the Promised End and Ugin, the Eye of the Storms. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Karn, the Great Creator and Chalice of the Void to hinder opponents' strategies. Urza's Saga provides additional ramp and flexibility, while cards like Glaring Fleshraker and Mind Stone help with card advantage and board presence. Overall, the deck aims to control the game with a combination of powerful Eldrazi creatures and disruptive spells to overwhelm opponents.

This deck revolves around assembling the UrzaTron lands (Urza's Mine, Tower, and Power Plant) to generate a large amount of mana quickly. The goal is to control the game with powerful Eldrazi creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and Devourer of Destiny, while also having access to powerful colorless spells like Ugin, the Spirit Dragon and All Is Dust. Karn, the Great Creator is used to tutor for key artifacts and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with mana advantage and disruptive plays.

The key concept of this deck is to quickly apply pressure on the opponent by playing low-cost aggressive creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter, while also utilizing efficient burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart to finish off the opponent. The deck aims to maintain tempo and board control through card advantage with cards like Mishra's Bauble and Expressive Iteration, while also incorporating some pump spells like Mutagenic Growth and Violent Urge to increase the damage output of its creatures.

This deck focuses on quickly developing a board presence by utilizing low-cost aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly chip away at the opponent's life total. It aims to apply continuous pressure on the opponent while also having the ability to dig for additional resources and pump up its creatures for additional damage. The deck's main goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of spells and creatures, forcing them to react defensively and ultimately win through sheer speed and aggression.
